String.Dest: Výborný nápad

String.Dest: Pokud chceš

String.Source: What's In It For You?
String.Dest: Co z toho máš?

String.Source: I Understand
String.Dest: Rozumím

String.Source: Talents?
String.Dest: Talenty?

String.Source: Sarcastic
String.Dest: Sarkasticky

String.Source: You're a Coward
String.Dest: Jsi zbabělec

String.Source: What kind of a mess am I walking into here?
String.Dest: What kind of a mess am I walking into here?

String.Source: All right! That's what I'm talking about.
String.Dest: All right! That's what I'm talking about.

String.Source: From what I hear, you've got a head-start on things already. Just talk to the rest of the gang leaders, smooth things over, and we're good.
String.Dest: From what I hear, you've got a head-start on things already. Just talk to the rest of the gang leaders, smooth things over, and we're good.

String.Source: We had a good head-start on it. Hell of a lot of work went into getting the Disciples, the Operators and the Pack to work together. But we got here.
String.Dest: We had a good head-start on it. Hell of a lot of work went into getting the Disciples, the Operators and the Pack to work together. But we got here.

String.Source: Are you screwing with me? Come on, this is the opportunity of a lifetime here! I wouldn't steer you wrong.
String.Dest: Are you screwing with me? Come on, this is the opportunity of a lifetime here! I wouldn't steer you wrong.

String.Source: Look, technically you're already the new Overboss, right? That's like, half the work done right there.
String.Dest: Look, technically you're already the new Overboss, right? That's like, half the work done right there.

String.Source: Then we get started on taking over the rest of Nuka-World.
String.Dest: Pak začneme o převzetí zbytku Nuka-Worldu.

String.Source: Sorry pal, I don't want the job.
String.Dest: Sorry pal, I don't want the job.

String.Source: Shit... Okay, okay. Just, don't take too long, all right?
String.Dest: Shit... Okay, okay. Just, don't take too long, all right?

String.Source: You don't have to trust 'em. Hell, you don't even have to like 'em. But you need them to respect you enough to follow you.
String.Dest: You don't have to trust 'em. Hell, you don't even have to like 'em. But you need them to respect you enough to follow you.

String.Source: Way I see it, surviving the Gauntlet means you got what it takes. Or at least the potential.
String.Dest: Way I see it, surviving the Gauntlet means you got what it takes. Or at least the potential.

String.Source: Everything you see here is under your control, now that you're in charge.
String.Dest: Everything you see here is under your control, now that you're in charge.

String.Source: I thought you might.
String.Dest: Myslel jsem si to.

String.Source: Yeah... I wouldn't count on that.
String.Dest: Yeah... I wouldn't count on that.

String.Source: The digs are yours now - hope you like the look. Colter had some peculiar tastes. But this view is something, huh?
String.Dest: The digs are yours now - hope you like the look. Colter had some peculiar tastes. But this view is something, huh?

String.Source: Hey, you want these guys at your throat, or doing whatever you tell 'em to? It's your call. I'm just saying... Give it a chance.
String.Dest: Hey, you want these guys at your throat, or doing whatever you tell 'em to? It's your call. I'm just saying... Give it a chance.

String.Source: Nope. That's bullshit. It can work. It just needs someone capable running the show. Someone like you.
String.Dest: Nope. That's bullshit. It can work. It just needs someone capable running the show. Someone like you.

String.Source: Just... meet the leaders. Talk with 'em, flex your muscles a little. Show 'em you mean business.
String.Dest: Just... meet the leaders. Talk with 'em, flex your muscles a little. Show 'em you mean business.

String.Source: Let's take a step back, and talk big picture, okay? Nuka-World... Shit, this was the dream.
String.Dest: Let's take a step back, and talk big picture, okay? Nuka-World... Shit, this was the dream.

String.Source: Aww, come on. I haven't even told you about all the perks yet!
String.Dest: Aww, come on. I haven't even told you about all the perks yet!

String.Source: You just need to show 'em you're the right man for the job.
String.Dest: You just need to show 'em you're the right man for the job.

String.Source: Tell me about it. I thought he had what it took, so I helped arrange this whole deal. Didn't work out. But, now that you're here, we've got a second shot...
String.Dest: Tell me about it. I thought he had what it took, so I helped arrange this whole deal. Didn't work out. But, now that you're here, we've got a second shot...

String.Source: You may have noticed that our former Overboss, Colter, was a fuckin' asshole.
String.Dest: You may have noticed that our former Overboss, Colter, was a fuckin' asshole.

String.Source: Don't worry, everybody likes me.
String.Dest: Don't worry, everybody likes me.

String.Source: Okay, let's do this.
String.Dest: Okay, let's do this.

String.Source: What happens after they're on my side?
String.Dest: What happens after they're on my side?

String.Source: I can fix this. I can make this work.
String.Dest: I can fix this. I can make this work.

String.Source: Yeah, all right... The Disciples like violence. The bloodier, the better. Tell 'em they'll get plenty of it.
String.Dest: Yeah, all right... The Disciples like violence. The bloodier, the better. Tell 'em they'll get plenty of it.

String.Source: I don't need them. I get by just fine on my own.
String.Dest: I don't need them. I get by just fine on my own.

String.Source: Like I told you, better to be running these guys than fighting them. And, uhh, you try and leave now... that ain't gonna go over so well.
String.Dest: Like I told you, better to be running these guys than fighting them. And, uhh, you try and leave now... that ain't gonna go over so well.

String.Source: I sure do like the sound of that.
String.Dest: I sure do like the sound of that.

String.Source: Colter couldn't pull this off? He was weak. Didn't deserve to be in charge.
String.Dest: Colter couldn't pull this off? He was weak. Didn't deserve to be in charge.

String.Source: First thing you gotta do is get the gangs behind you. Without them supporting you, you're not getting shit done.
String.Dest: First thing you gotta do is get the gangs behind you. Without them supporting you, you're not getting shit done.

String.Source: Okay, settle down. Most of these psychos have seen shit that'd scare your nightmares; they're not gonna be that easy to intimidate.
String.Dest: Dobrá, v klidu. Většina z těch psychoušů zažila řádný sračky na to, aby je vyděsily ty tvoje noční můry; takže je nebude tak snadný zastrašit.

String.Source: Now that, right there, is just the kind of attitude I was hoping for.
String.Dest: Now that, right there, is just the kind of attitude I was hoping for.

String.Source: The gangs got restless, and started pissing each other off. It was... is... a real mess.
String.Dest: The gangs got restless, and started pissing each other off. It was... is... a real mess.

String.Source: Oh my god, shut up with this. I'm telling you - you need their help.
String.Dest: Oh my god, shut up with this. I'm telling you - you need their help.

String.Source: I still don't get it. Why put me in charge?
String.Dest: I still don't get it. Why put me in charge?

String.Source: I've got enough going on. I don't need this hassle.
String.Dest: I've got enough going on. I don't need this hassle.

String.Source: Yeah? Man, I sure hope so.
String.Dest: Yeah? Man, I sure hope so.

String.Source: Just give it a chance, okay? You might even have a little fun.
String.Dest: Just give it a chance, okay? You might even have a little fun.

String.Source: They'll listen if they're all afraid of me.
String.Dest: They'll listen if they're all afraid of me.

String.Source: Sounds like this whole thing is a waste of time.
String.Dest: Sounds like this whole thing is a waste of time.

String.Source: It was little shit at first: heated tempers, arguments, the occasional shooting. Got worse over time, though.
String.Dest: It was little shit at first: heated tempers, arguments, the occasional shooting. Got worse over time, though.

String.Source: If I'm really running the show now, let's get to work.
String.Dest: If I'm really running the show now, let's get to work.

String.Source: Have any advice for how I should go about it?
String.Dest: Have any advice for how I should go about it?

String.Source: And that's me being nice. Ended up being poison for this whole operation.
String.Dest: And that's me being nice. Ended up being poison for this whole operation.

String.Source: Let's keep the conversating between us, okay? Meet me in the Overboss quarters.
String.Dest: Držme se konverzace mezi námi, jo? Sejdeme se ve Overbossovo ubikacích.

String.Source: I need some time to think it over, Gage.
String.Dest: I need some time to think it over, Gage.

String.Source: Look, I know these gangs. Been workin' with them or against them for years now. I'll help you, okay? Walk you through everything.
String.Dest: Look, I know these gangs. Been workin' with them or against them for years now. I'll help you, okay? Walk you through everything.

String.Source: So, you're welcome in the Parlor whenever you like. Make yourself at home.
String.Dest: So, you're welcome in the Parlor whenever you like. Make yourself at home.

String.Source: Well, you're back in one piece. That's a good sign.
String.Dest: Well, you're back in one piece. That's a good sign.

String.Source: When you finish what Colter started, you give us control of this park. Then you set your sights on the Commonwealth.
String.Dest: When you finish what Colter started, you give us control of this park. Then you set your sights on the Commonwealth.

String.Source: So, you're Gage's little pet project.
String.Dest: So, you're Gage's little pet project.

String.Source: Good. You're either smart or you value your life. Either way, that's exactly what I wanted to hear.
String.Dest: Good. You're either smart or you value your life. Either way, that's exactly what I wanted to hear.

String.Source: Be a good dog and do what you're told, or you'll be put down.
String.Dest: Be a good dog and do what you're told, or you'll be put down.

String.Source: Everything all peachy with our friendly neighborhood psychopaths?
String.Dest: Everything all peachy with our friendly neighborhood psychopaths?

String.Source: Now that I get a closer look at you... not sure I'm buying this new Overboss thing.
String.Dest: Now that I get a closer look at you... not sure I'm buying this new Overboss thing.

String.Source: This place is huge. Divided up into sections. Parks, whatever the hell they called 'em back in the day.
String.Dest: This place is huge. Divided up into sections. Parks, whatever the hell they called 'em back in the day.

String.Source: So that's it. Nice and simple, right? Take a minute, settle in if you want, and then let's get to it.
String.Dest: So that's it. Nice and simple, right? Take a minute, settle in if you want, and then let's get to it.

String.Source: Look. Let's cut to the chase. You going to do right by the Pack?
String.Dest: Dívej se. Pojďme rovnou k jádru věci. Budeš pracovat pro Šelmy?

String.Source: Who gets what - that'll be your call. Whoever you hand it off to will appreciate it, but the others might get a little jealous. You know how it goes.
String.Dest: Who gets what - that'll be your call. Whoever you hand it off to will appreciate it, but the others might get a little jealous. You know how it goes.

String.Source: Of course. Just remember to think about it like this: how much do you value your life?
String.Dest: Of course. Just remember to think about it like this: how much do you value your life?

String.Source: And you want to explain to me why exactly I should be backing the Operators?
String.Dest: And you want to explain to me why exactly I should be backing the Operators?

String.Source: Name's Mason. The Pack's Alpha.
String.Dest: Jmenuje se Mason. Alfa šelma.

String.Source: Hah. Never heard that one before.
String.Dest: Hah. Never heard that one before.

String.Source: If that aint a lie, then things might end up alright between us.
String.Dest: If that aint a lie, then things might end up alright between us.

String.Source: I knew you had it in you.
String.Dest: I knew you had it in you.

String.Source: The Pack does what I tell them. You don't get in my way, they won't get in yours.
String.Dest: The Pack does what I tell them. You don't get in my way, they won't get in yours.

String.Source: Taking down an opponent like that, it's thrilling.
String.Dest: Taking down an opponent like that, it's thrilling.

String.Source: Caps. This place was built for the sole purpose of taking caps out of the pockets of fools.
String.Dest: Caps. This place was built for the sole purpose of taking caps out of the pockets of fools.

String.Source: And what is it you want?
String.Dest: And what is it you want?

String.Source: Time to roll up your sleeves, boss. There's work to be done.
String.Dest: Time to roll up your sleeves, boss. There's work to be done.

String.Source: Don't worry, you'll get your fair share of the caps.
String.Dest: Don't worry, you'll get your fair share of the caps.

String.Source: What comes next, Gage?
String.Dest: What comes next, Gage?

String.Source: Let's work together, Mason. I'm not interested in ruining your gig.
String.Dest: Let's work together, Mason. I'm not interested in ruining your gig.

String.Source: Mind your own business, Gage.
String.Dest: Mind your own business, Gage.

String.Source: What were you discussing when I walked in?
String.Dest: What were you discussing when I walked in?

String.Source: All the gangs are on board.
String.Dest: All the gangs are on board.

String.Source: They'll do what they're told. That's all that matters.
String.Dest: They'll do what they're told. That's all that matters.

String.Source: My goal's to use this place to make all the money I can.
String.Dest: My goal's to use this place to make all the money I can.

String.Source: Because we dispense with the bullshit. My people aren't commanded by lunatic bloodlust or animal instincts.
String.Dest: Because we dispense with the bullshit. My people aren't commanded by lunatic bloodlust or animal instincts.

String.Source: I'll do my best to hold things together, but don't leave me hanging here.
String.Dest: I'll do my best to hold things together, but don't leave me hanging here.

String.Source: Work for me. I'll get you whatever you want.
String.Dest: Work for me. I'll get you whatever you want.

String.Source: We need to take 'em all back, one at a time. Every section we secure gives us a little more breathing room, and more resources.
String.Dest: We need to take 'em all back, one at a time. Every section we secure gives us a little more breathing room, and more resources.

String.Source: Well. I suppose we all owe you for putting down Colter.
String.Dest: Well. I suppose we all owe you for putting down Colter.

String.Source: The Pack? Fitting. You smell like animals.
String.Dest: The Pack? Fitting. You smell like animals.

String.Source: I'll think about it.
String.Dest: Budu o tom přemýšlet.

String.Source: Your people aren't going to cause me any problems, are they?
String.Dest: Your people aren't going to cause me any problems, are they?

String.Source: I intend to treat all the gangs equally.
String.Dest: I intend to treat all the gangs equally.

String.Source: Next? The fun stuff.
String.Dest: Next? The fun stuff.

String.Source: I'm sorry. That sounds like a demand. I'm the Overboss around here. And I'll do whatever the hell I want.
String.Dest: I'm sorry. That sounds like a demand. I'm the Overboss around here. And I'll do whatever the hell I want.

String.Source: Sure hope you didn't promise them too much...
String.Dest: Sure hope you didn't promise them too much...

String.Source: Looks like you're already a step above Colter. I'll see how this plays out... for now.
String.Dest: Looks like you're already a step above Colter. I'll see how this plays out... for now.

String.Source: Sure, fine. But it ain't just about the caps. It's also about respect.
String.Dest: Sure, fine. But it ain't just about the caps. It's also about respect.

String.Source: Haven't you figured it out yet? Your business is my business. I only succeed here if you do.
String.Dest: Haven't you figured it out yet? Your business is my business. I only succeed here if you do.

String.Source: I don't make promises, and you'll do what I say.
String.Dest: I don't make promises, and you'll do what I say.

String.Source: I think we can all respect caps, if not each other.
String.Dest: I think we can all respect caps, if not each other.

String.Source: Regardless, Gage's decree means that you're the new Overboss.
String.Dest: Regardless, Gage's decree means that you're the new Overboss.

String.Source: Bored. Kind of like this conversation, now that you mention it...
String.Dest: Bored. Kind of like this conversation, now that you mention it...

String.Source: I once knew a man with an attitude like that. I let him live just long enough to regret it.
String.Dest: I once knew a man with an attitude like that. I let him live just long enough to regret it.

String.Source: Look. It ain't like anyone's broke up about Colter.
String.Dest: Look. It ain't like anyone's broke up about Colter.

String.Source: Well... you, Overboss. You're... an unknown quantity. And we're interested in knowing who we're dealing with.
String.Dest: Well... you, Overboss. You're... an unknown quantity. And we're interested in knowing who we're dealing with.

String.Source: Ho boy, okay...
String.Dest: Ho boy, okay...

String.Source: Let me talk you through this whole thing, okay?
String.Dest: Let me talk you through this whole thing, okay?

String.Source: So, come on... Are you gonna talk to the gangs, get 'em on your side?
String.Dest: So, come on... Are you gonna talk to the gangs, get 'em on your side?

String.Source: Welcome home, boss.
String.Dest: Welcome home, boss.

String.Source: Actually, I'm really more in this for the soda.
String.Dest: Actually, I'm really more in this for the soda.

String.Source: I guess we can take some solace in the fact that someone finally gave him what he deserved.
String.Dest: I guess we can take some solace in the fact that someone finally gave him what he deserved.

String.Source: You see, the Disciples don't make empty threats, we make good on them.
String.Dest: You see, the Disciples don't make empty threats, we make good on them.

String.Source: What's the Pack got over the other gangs?
String.Dest: Jak se Šelmy mohou dostat nad ostatními gangy?

String.Source: But... if you support us and keep your promises like a good, little Overboss, we back you, you get to live, and everybody wins.
String.Dest: But... if you support us and keep your promises like a good, little Overboss, we back you, you get to live, and everybody wins.

String.Source: Regret, I guess. I didn't want to kill him.
String.Dest: Regret, I guess. I didn't want to kill him.

String.Source: And what's that?
String.Dest: And what's that?

String.Source: And if you think you might be interested in running some jobs for us, you just come speak to me.
String.Dest: And if you think you might be interested in running some jobs for us, you just come speak to me.

String.Source: Making money?
String.Dest: Making money?

String.Source: I want to know. What did you feel as you did it? When you brought that walking pile of human garbage to his knees?
String.Dest: I want to know. What did you feel as you did it? When you brought that walking pile of human garbage to his knees?

String.Source: Happiness?
String.Dest: Štěstí?

String.Source: Exactly.
String.Dest: Přesně.

String.Source: We only joined Gage and Colter's little menagerie in order to restore it to that goal...
String.Dest: We only joined Gage and Colter's little menagerie in order to restore it to that goal...

String.Source: We are the only rational players around here and would make valuable allies, so long as we know you intend to get this place back to bringing in caps.
String.Dest: We are the only rational players around here and would make valuable allies, so long as we know you intend to get this place back to bringing in caps.

String.Source: Soda?
String.Dest: Soda?

String.Source: Of course, Overboss.
String.Dest: Of course, Overboss.

String.Source: Yes. What went through you as you crushed the life out of that oaf?
String.Dest: Yes. What went through you as you crushed the life out of that oaf?

String.Source: Instead Colter had us sitting on our asses for the better part of a year while he lived large in his damn mountaintop.
String.Dest: Instead Colter had us sitting on our asses for the better part of a year while he lived large in his damn mountaintop.

String.Source: So, we'd like if you answered the question.
String.Dest: So, we'd like if you answered the question.

String.Source: Nope.
String.Dest: Ne.

String.Source: You'll come to understand soon enough that we are the only gang you should be backing around here.
String.Dest: You'll come to understand soon enough that we are the only gang you should be backing around here.

String.Source: Well, it's about damn time.
String.Dest: Well, it's about damn time.

String.Source: Agreed. Not going to make much of a splash around Nuka-World with an attitude like that...
String.Dest: Agreed. Not going to make much of a splash around Nuka-World with an attitude like that...

String.Source: Hmm. Perhaps you're better suited to this than I expected.
String.Dest: Hmm. Perhaps you're better suited to this than I expected.

String.Source: Heh. Not quite.
String.Dest: Heh. Not quite.

String.Source: It's all right, William.
String.Dest: It's all right, William.

String.Source: Hmm. Of course, boss.
String.Dest: Hmm. Of course, boss.

String.Source: Hey. You don't get to talk to Mags that way.
String.Dest: Hey. You don't get to talk to Mags that way.

String.Source: You'd be the only one...
String.Dest: You'd be the only one...

String.Source: Sure looked it.
String.Dest: Sure looked it.

String.Source: And that we're going to get back to robbing folks of their fucking money.
String.Dest: And that we're going to get back to robbing folks of their fucking money.

String.Source: Along with our co-conspirator Lizzie, we run this crew. Call ourselves the Operators.
String.Dest: Along with our co-conspirator Lizzie, we run this crew. Call ourselves the Operators.

String.Source: Because we're the only ones who see this place for what it is. A temple. A testament to the only thing that matters in this world.
String.Dest: Because we're the only ones who see this place for what it is. A temple. A testament to the only thing that matters in this world.

String.Source: Pleasure.
String.Dest: Potěšení.

String.Source: So, we want to know what your plan is.
String.Dest: So, we want to know what your plan is.

String.Source: Hmm. I look forward to seeing your claims put into action.
String.Dest: Hmm. I look forward to seeing your claims put into action.

String.Source: And that means if you're going to be in charge around here, we'd like some assurances that you intend to bring this place back to its true purpose.
String.Dest: And that means if you're going to be in charge around here, we'd like some assurances that you intend to bring this place back to its true purpose.

String.Source: Man was an idiot. Made us all look bad.
String.Dest: Man was an idiot. Made us all look bad.

String.Source: Whatever you say.
String.Dest: Jak myslíš.

String.Source: Great. Another nut--
String.Dest: Great. Another nut--

String.Source: William.
String.Dest: William.

String.Source: This is my brother, William.
String.Dest: This is my brother, William.

String.Source: Heh. A clown stuck in his own little car.
String.Dest: Heh. A clown stuck in his own little car.

String.Source: Do cake walks end in death? Because if Gage hadn't helped your ass, you'd be dead right now.
String.Dest: Do cake walks end in death? Because if Gage hadn't helped your ass, you'd be dead right now.

String.Source: I'm going to do things my way, whether you approve or not.
String.Dest: I'm going to do things my way, whether you approve or not.

String.Source: He made a lot of promises to get us here, and never followed through.
String.Dest: He made a lot of promises to get us here, and never followed through.

String.Source: How many lives has this Gauntlet claimed?
String.Dest: How many lives has this Gauntlet claimed?

String.Source: We aren't swayed by caps like those spoiled brats obsessed with their hair, or those savage animals who can't behave in public.
String.Dest: We aren't swayed by caps like those spoiled brats obsessed with their hair, or those savage animals who can't behave in public.

String.Source: Are you questioning me? Your Overboss?
String.Dest: Are you questioning me? Your Overboss?

String.Source: Depends on what you're looking for.
String.Dest: Depends on what you're looking for.

String.Source: We were wrong about Colter. We won't make the same mistake twice.
String.Dest: We were wrong about Colter. We won't make the same mistake twice.

String.Source: Not questioning, just curious.
String.Dest: Not questioning, just curious.

String.Source: Good to see the new boss at least has some taste. I might let you keep that head on your shoulders after all.
String.Dest: Good to see the new boss at least has some taste. I might let you keep that head on your shoulders after all.

String.Source: Oh yeah? I just have a few things for you to consider before you go off and do things "your way."
String.Dest: Oh yeah? I just have a few things for you to consider before you go off and do things "your way."

String.Source: Willing to bet your life on that?
String.Dest: Willing to bet your life on that?

String.Source: Dangerous? People are dangerous. That thing's child's play. Just a bunch of traps and critters.
String.Dest: Dangerous? People are dangerous. That thing's child's play. Just a bunch of traps and critters.

String.Source: Someone who's not afraid to get blood on their hands and make some real changes around here.
String.Dest: Someone who's not afraid to get blood on their hands and make some real changes around here.

String.Source: You call that a Gauntlet? More like a cake walk.
String.Dest: You call that a Gauntlet? More like a cake walk.

String.Source: And once the Commonwealth is yours, and believe me, with our help it will be...
String.Dest: And once the Commonwealth is yours, and believe me, with our help it will be...

String.Source: I'm the best there is.
String.Dest: I'm the best there is.

String.Source: I thought it was pretty impressive.
String.Dest: I thought it was pretty impressive.

String.Source: That thing should be shut down. It's dangerous.
String.Dest: That thing should be shut down. It's dangerous.

String.Source: You need anything else?
String.Dest: You need anything else?

String.Source: Ha! You might make it out of here alive after all.
String.Dest: Ha! You might make it out of here alive after all.

String.Source: I'm not here to make us friends. I'm here to make us some caps.
String.Dest: Nejsem tu proto, aby z nás byli přátelé. Jsem tu pro nějaké zátky.

String.Source: The Operators are in it mostly for the money. They get promised caps, they'll listen to you.
String.Dest: The Operators are in it mostly for the money. They get promised caps, they'll listen to you.

String.Source: Whatever. Don't matter.
String.Dest: Whatever. Don't matter.

String.Source: You stake a claim, plant a little flag for one of the gangs, and that settles it. It's theirs for good.
String.Dest: You stake a claim, plant a little flag for one of the gangs, and that settles it. It's theirs for good.

String.Source: Don't worry. Gage knew what he was doing.
String.Dest: Don't worry. Gage knew what he was doing.

String.Source: For a good while now, we've needed someone who can get shit done. Make real progress.
String.Dest: For a good while now, we've needed someone who can get shit done. Make real progress.

String.Source: Yeah, good call.
String.Dest: Yeah, good call.

String.Source: Besides, you can't possibly be worse than Colter.
String.Dest: Besides, you can't possibly be worse than Colter.

String.Source: Yeah, yeah. Sure, boss.
String.Dest: Yeah, yeah. Sure, boss.

String.Source: At least it ain't Mags Black or that freak Nisha.
String.Dest: At least it ain't Mags Black or that freak Nisha.

String.Source: Slow down there, boss-lady. We're just getting to know each other.
String.Dest: Slow down there, boss-lady. We're just getting to know each other.

String.Source: We're totally willing to give you a chance. We are.
String.Dest: We're totally willing to give you a chance. We are.

String.Source: But we thought Colter was the real deal, too. And he's laying in a pool of his own blood.
String.Dest: But we thought Colter was the real deal, too. And he's laying in a pool of his own blood.

String.Source: Don't get me wrong. Colter was definitely Overboss. Not a man to mess with.
String.Dest: Don't get me wrong. Colter was definitely Overboss. Not a man to mess with.

String.Source: 'Bout a year ago, we push in through the front gate, take over Nuka-Town, get these traders under our thumb...
String.Dest: 'Bout a year ago, we push in through the front gate, take over Nuka-Town, get these traders under our thumb...

String.Source: But, one step at a time. You in?
String.Dest: But, one step at a time. You in?

String.Source: Yeah, "Boss." Just trying to fill you in on why we're all so pissed off.
String.Dest: Yeah, "Boss." Just trying to fill you in on why we're all so pissed off.

String.Source: We're gonna be one big happy family.
String.Dest: We're gonna be one big happy family.

String.Source: And then there's The Pack. I'm not sayin' they're savages, but... well, shit. They're savages. I don't know how Mason keeps them on a leash.
String.Dest: And then there's The Pack. I'm not sayin' they're savages, but... well, shit. They're savages. I don't know how Mason keeps them on a leash.

String.Source: If I were you, I'd start with the Disciples. They might all be crazy - probably are, in fact - but Nisha has her reasonable moments.
String.Dest: If I were you, I'd start with the Disciples. They might all be crazy - probably are, in fact - but Nisha has her reasonable moments.

String.Source: I'm not Colter, so that better not happen to me.
String.Dest: I'm not Colter, so that better not happen to me.

String.Source: If I thought the other gangs would go along, yeah, I'd run this place in a heart beat. Might have to - if you turn out to be a turd.
String.Dest: If I thought the other gangs would go along, yeah, I'd run this place in a heart beat. Might have to - if you turn out to be a turd.

String.Source: But that was a year ago. Then Colter went soft. Wanted to "take stock in what we achieved."
String.Dest: But that was a year ago. Then Colter went soft. Wanted to "take stock in what we achieved."

String.Source: Yeah, sure. Boss. I get it. I do.
String.Dest: Yeah, sure. Boss. I get it. I do.

String.Source: Jury's still out on that.
String.Dest: Jury's still out on that.

String.Source: We're all in this together. This can be good for everyone.
String.Dest: We're all in this together. This can be good for everyone.

String.Source: Nothing else for now.
String.Dest: Nothing else for now.

String.Source: You might be Overboss - for now. But I'm the boss of the Pack. And it's going to stay that way.
String.Dest: Ty můžeš být Overboss - prozatím. Ale já jsem šéf Šelem. A tak to i zůstane.

String.Source: I want to know more about Nuka-World.
String.Dest: I want to know more about Nuka-World.

String.Source: And things were good in the beginning. Real good.
String.Dest: And things were good in the beginning. Real good.

String.Source: The fuck's a resume?
String.Dest: The fuck's a resume?

String.Source: You need something, boss?
String.Dest: You need something, boss?

String.Source: You don't want to be Overboss?
String.Dest: You don't want to be Overboss?

String.Source: But Gage says you're the boss now. So, you're the boss.
String.Dest: But Gage says you're the boss now. So, you're the boss.

String.Source: Been wondering that ourselves.
String.Dest: Been wondering that ourselves.

String.Source: The gangs expect results, and they ain't gonna wait forever, Overboss.
String.Dest: The gangs expect results, and they ain't gonna wait forever, Overboss.

String.Source: Then you've got the Operators. Spoiled rich kids, but doesn't mean they ain't ruthless killers. If you can impress Mags, she'll listen to you.
String.Dest: Pak tu máš Provozáky. Zkažené bohaté děti, ale neznamená to, že to nejsou nelítostní zabijáci. Pokud zapůsobíš na Mags, bude ti naslouchat.

String.Source: Just figured on his replacement being... Well, different.
String.Dest: Just figured on his replacement being... Well, different.

String.Source: Yeah, okay...
String.Dest: Yeah, okay...

String.Source: I have big plans for this place, you'll see.
String.Dest: I have big plans for this place, you'll see.

String.Source: As long as you care about yourself, you'll do what I tell you.
String.Dest: As long as you care about yourself, you'll do what I tell you.

String.Source: Took a shitload of work to get them all on board with this idea, so I really don't want to lose them now.
String.Dest: Took a shitload of work to get them all on board with this idea, so I really don't want to lose them now.

String.Source: And then... Well, Colter got lazy. He was content to sit on his ass, never bothered putting in the effort to finish taking over the park.
String.Dest: And then... Well, Colter got lazy. He was content to sit on his ass, never bothered putting in the effort to finish taking over the park.

String.Source: So, what's the real story behind Gage and Colter?
String.Dest: So, what's the real story behind Gage and Colter?

String.Source: Maybe you're the real deal.
String.Dest: Maybe you're the real deal.

String.Source: Slow down there, boss-man. We're just getting to know each other.
String.Dest: Slow down there, boss-man. We're just getting to know each other.

String.Source: The Overboss returns...
String.Dest: The Overboss returns...

String.Source: All right. You know where to find me.
String.Dest: All right. You know where to find me.

String.Source: I'll send you my resume and references.
String.Dest: I'll send you my resume and references.

String.Source: Up to you who you want to trust the most, but you're gonna need to trust at least some of them.
String.Dest: Up to you who you want to trust the most, but you're gonna need to trust at least some of them.

String.Source: Tell me more about the gangs.
String.Dest: Tell me more about the gangs.

String.Source: Long as you don't go forgetting that, we're gonna be fine.
String.Dest: Long as you don't go forgetting that, we're gonna be fine.

String.Source: This here's our side of town.
String.Dest: This here's our side of town.

String.Source: Ain't nothing I ain't already told you.
String.Dest: Ain't nothing I ain't already told you.

String.Source: Yeah, quite the assorted bunch. All used to hate each other, and I guess maybe they still do to a degree.
String.Dest: Yeah, quite the assorted bunch. All used to hate each other, and I guess maybe they still do to a degree.

String.Source: You gonna be a problem I need to solve?
String.Dest: You gonna be a problem I need to solve?

String.Source: I trust we're done with the history lesson?
String.Dest: I trust we're done with the history lesson?

String.Source: You can trust me. I'll be a good leader.
String.Dest: You can trust me. I'll be a good leader.

String.Source: Colter was weak. Why'd you follow him at all?
String.Dest: Colter was weak. Why'd you follow him at all?

String.Source: No offense, but you just got here. We'll see what you can do.
String.Dest: No offense, but you just got here. We'll see what you can do.

String.Source: The Operators will cut your throat as soon as they get what they want out of you.
String.Dest: The Operators will cut your throat as soon as they get what they want out of you.

String.Source: And the Disciples? Who the fuck knows what those crazy bitches want.
String.Dest: And the Disciples? Who the fuck knows what those crazy bitches want.

String.Source: You got a lot to learn, boss.
String.Dest: You got a lot to learn, boss.

String.Source: I think you're a bunch of ungrateful children.
String.Dest: I think you're a bunch of ungrateful children.

String.Source: There's something wrong with them. And you just can't trust someone who ain't willing to show you their face.
String.Dest: There's something wrong with them. And you just can't trust someone who ain't willing to show you their face.

String.Source: Pulling the gangs together was a smart move.
String.Dest: Pulling the gangs together was a smart move.

String.Source: I mean, going a little over the top is part of the game, but you don't want them holding it against you if you can't deliver.
String.Dest: I mean, going a little over the top is part of the game, but you don't want them holding it against you if you can't deliver.

String.Source: Oh come on. It ain't that hard to see.
String.Dest: Oh come on. It ain't that hard to see.

String.Source: Sure, this place beats living in the shit holes we had out there. But it ain't the palace of caps we signed on for.
String.Dest: Sure, this place beats living in the shit holes we had out there. But it ain't the palace of caps we signed on for.

String.Source: They knew the risks going in. And hell, they were all probably gonna die young anyway.
String.Dest: They knew the risks going in. And hell, they were all probably gonna die young anyway.

String.Source: They ain't organized, they don't make smart decisions. Basically one step up from rabid animals.
String.Dest: They ain't organized, they don't make smart decisions. Basically one step up from rabid animals.

String.Source: Aren't you Raiders all the same?
String.Dest: Nejste, vy nájezdníci, všichni stejní?

String.Source: Sounds like you've been through a lot, Gage.
String.Dest: Sounds like you've been through a lot, Gage.

String.Source: Thanks. I'll take credit for that one. Colter did the heavy lifting, but it was my idea.
String.Dest: Thanks. I'll take credit for that one. Colter did the heavy lifting, but it was my idea.

String.Source: We're thinking it makes a good central location for sending gangs out.
String.Dest: We're thinking it makes a good central location for sending gangs out.

String.Source: You need anything else?
String.Dest: You need anything else?

String.Source: They were dug in like ticks. That's why it took pulling a bunch of gangs together to even have a chance.
String.Dest: They were dug in like ticks. That's why it took pulling a bunch of gangs together to even have a chance.

String.Source: So we've got Nuka-Town, and most of the traders work for us now. They ain't happy about it, but screw 'em.
String.Dest: So we've got Nuka-Town, and most of the traders work for us now. They ain't happy about it, but screw 'em.

String.Source: You might wanna watch how loudly you say shit like that.
String.Dest: You might wanna watch how loudly you say shit like that.

String.Source: So the sooner you get 'em all to agree to follow orders, the sooner we can improve our situation.
String.Dest: So the sooner you get 'em all to agree to follow orders, the sooner we can improve our situation.

String.Source: No shit. We've all seen it worse.
String.Dest: No shit. We've all seen it worse.

String.Source: You telling me that doesn't sound like even just a little bit of fun to you?
String.Dest: You telling me that doesn't sound like even just a little bit of fun to you?

String.Source: Anyway, we weren't the first to think of this place as a good stronghold.
String.Dest: Anyway, we weren't the first to think of this place as a good stronghold.

String.Source: No question that it's a good location.
String.Dest: No question that it's a good location.

String.Source: Things were going to hell fast, but Gage put the brakes on that. Got us together and promised he'd find someone to deal with Colter.
String.Dest: Things were going to hell fast, but Gage put the brakes on that. Got us together and promised he'd find someone to deal with Colter.

String.Source: Well that's the difference. Gangs out here, they've got leaders. They're better organized.
String.Dest: Well that's the difference. Gangs out here, they've got leaders. They're better organized.

String.Source: I don't get it, Gage. What's the appeal of all this?
String.Dest: I don't get it, Gage. What's the appeal of all this?

String.Source: Careful there, boss.
String.Dest: Careful there, boss.

String.Source: I've run with some of them over the years. Every single time, they either think way too small or get themselves wiped out.
String.Dest: I've run with some of them over the years. Every single time, they either think way too small or get themselves wiped out.

String.Source: Anyway, don't mistake the gangs out here for being the same as those Commonwealth saps.
String.Dest: Anyway, don't mistake the gangs out here for being the same as those Commonwealth saps.

String.Source: Commonwealth "gangs"... well, most of 'em don't even qualify.
String.Dest: Commonwealth "gangs"... well, most of 'em don't even qualify.

String.Source: We really need the rest of these parks, though. Every one of 'em not under our control is a threat.
String.Dest: We really need the rest of these parks, though. Every one of 'em not under our control is a threat.

String.Source: I make a point of getting the hell out of Dodge before that happens.
String.Dest: I make a point of getting the hell out of Dodge before that happens.

String.Source: They just need a good leader.
String.Dest: They just need a good leader.

String.Source: You've got this area of the park. Isn't that enough? Why do you want more?
String.Dest: You've got this area of the park. Isn't that enough? Why do you want more?

String.Source: Hey, come on now. No need to be insulting.
String.Dest: Hey, come on now. No need to be insulting.

String.Source: Anything that's more than the sitting around we been doing for the last year.
String.Dest: Anything that's more than the sitting around we been doing for the last year.

String.Source: We ain't ungrateful. Just fed up.
String.Dest: We ain't ungrateful. Just fed up.

String.Source: You ask me, Raiders are all stupid.
String.Dest: You ask me, Raiders are all stupid.

String.Source: You must have lost a lot of men just getting this far.
String.Dest: You must have lost a lot of men just getting this far.

String.Source: You take whatever you want, from whoever you want. Anybody has a problem with that, you cut 'em down.
String.Dest: You take whatever you want, from whoever you want. Anybody has a problem with that, you cut 'em down.

String.Source: Big-time amusement park back before the world went to shit. Well, I guess if this place is any indication, it wasn't so hot before it all blew up.
String.Dest: Big-time amusement park back before the world went to shit. Well, I guess if this place is any indication, it wasn't so hot before it all blew up.

String.Source: The Pack are the meanest sons of bitches you'll ever meet. We do whatever it takes. And we're fiercely loyal.
String.Dest: Šelmy jsou ti nejzlejší zkurvysyni, se kterejma se můžeš kdy setkat. Uděláme cokoliv je třeba a jsme loajální.

String.Source: Anybody who survives to this age, yeah... Been through a lot of shit.
String.Dest: Anybody who survives to this age, yeah... Been through a lot of shit.

String.Source: Yeah. The traders thought it'd make a good hub, pulling in buyers from all around.
String.Dest: Yeah. The traders thought it'd make a good hub, pulling in buyers from all around.

String.Source: Most of 'em are, no question. But don't go thinking we're all the same. Good way to get yourself killed.
String.Dest: Most of 'em are, no question. But don't go thinking we're all the same. Good way to get yourself killed.

String.Source: Things could be worse. Trust me. I've seen it.
String.Dest: Things could be worse. Trust me. I've seen it.

String.Source: And the gangs are too cramped up. They're stepping all over each other. Unless they get room to spread out, there's gonna be bloodshed.
String.Dest: And the gangs are too cramped up. They're stepping all over each other. Unless they get room to spread out, there's gonna be bloodshed.

String.Source: Gangs out here, they got agendas. And they're gonna expect results. You can't afford to forget that.
String.Dest: Gangs out here, they got agendas. And they're gonna expect results. You can't afford to forget that.

String.Source: Before we got here, bunch of traders had set up shop, and hired a whole lotta guns to protect 'em.
String.Dest: Before we got here, bunch of traders had set up shop, and hired a whole lotta guns to protect 'em.

String.Source: So what is it you want?
String.Dest: So what is it you want?

String.Source: Ain't no two things in this world that's truly equal, boss. Everything has its place.
String.Dest: Ain't no two things in this world that's truly equal, boss. Everything has its place.

String.Source: I'm listening.
String.Dest: Poslouchám.

String.Source: If you want us at your heel, we expect to be top dogs around here.
String.Dest: If you want us at your heel, we expect to be top dogs around here.

String.Source: Ain't none of us happy - not even the Disciples. And they're normally a chipper bunch so long as they're drenched in blood.
String.Dest: Ain't none of us happy - not even the Disciples. And they're normally a chipper bunch so long as they're drenched in blood.

String.Source: One gang is gonna end up on top, and one on the bottom. It's a simple law of nature.
String.Dest: One gang is gonna end up on top, and one on the bottom. It's a simple law of nature.

String.Source: Caps. Action. Something!
String.Dest: Caps. Action. Something!

String.Source: You, uhh, got any more questions?
String.Dest: You, uhh, got any more questions?

String.Source: Not in front of my guys, alright?
String.Dest: Not in front of my guys, alright?

String.Source: But ain't likely you're gonna be any worse than Colter.
String.Dest: But ain't likely you're gonna be any worse than Colter.

String.Source: Woah there, boss.
String.Dest: Woah there, boss.

String.Source: Me? Overboss? Nah. Seems to be a short-lived position.
String.Dest: Me? Overboss? Nah. Seems to be a short-lived position.

String.Source: Might a been the whole point of the Gauntlet all along.
String.Dest: Might a been the whole point of the Gauntlet all along.

String.Source: You know what? ...I think we're not so different me and you.
String.Dest: You know what? ...I think we're not so different me and you.

String.Source: Story is that Gage talked Colter into becoming Overboss. And he got you in here, didn't he?
String.Dest: Story is that Gage talked Colter into becoming Overboss. And he got you in here, didn't he?

String.Source: Maybe he likes people owing him. Maybe it lets him get things done without getting dirt on his hands.
String.Dest: Maybe he likes people owing him. Maybe it lets him get things done without getting dirt on his hands.

String.Source: I want you to have this. Consider it a token of our mutual understanding - and respect.
String.Dest: I want you to have this. Consider it a token of our mutual understanding - and respect.

String.Source: I hear you've been talking to the other gangs.
String.Dest: I hear you've been talking to the other gangs.

String.Source: After Colter went soft, Gage got us behind closed doors, and promised us he'd get someone to off Colter.
String.Dest: After Colter went soft, Gage got us behind closed doors, and promised us he'd get someone to off Colter.

String.Source: Hey, I only know what I've heard.
String.Dest: Hey, I only know what I've heard.

String.Source: You got enough to worry about without a dominance struggle inside the Pack to deal with.
String.Dest: You got enough to worry about without a dominance struggle inside the Pack to deal with.

String.Source: Trust me. It definitely won't come to that.
String.Dest: Trust me. It definitely won't come to that.

String.Source: Look. Let's cut to the chase. You going to do right by the Pack?
String.Dest: Dívej se. Pojďme rovnou k jádru věci. Budeš pracovat pro Šelmy?

String.Source: And you did just that.
String.Dest: And you did just that.

String.Source: Trust me, we need the space. And it'd be good to have a few less threats surrounding us, too.
String.Dest: Trust me, we need the space. And it'd be good to have a few less threats surrounding us, too.

String.Source: I bet you guys are great at parties.
String.Dest: I bet you guys are great at parties.

String.Source: Heh. If I was, I would've slit that little suckup's throat a long time ago.
String.Dest: Heh. If I was, I would've slit that little suckup's throat a long time ago.

String.Source: That's what I was trying to tell Colter all long. Maybe if he listened, he'd still be around.
String.Dest: That's what I was trying to tell Colter all long. Maybe if he listened, he'd still be around.

String.Source: Who's counting? It's at least enough to keep the traders busy. We like to send them in to clean out the bodies whenever things get ripe in there.
String.Dest: Who's counting? It's at least enough to keep the traders busy. We like to send them in to clean out the bodies whenever things get ripe in there.

String.Source: Let's just hope Gage is right about you.
String.Dest: Let's just hope Gage is right about you.

String.Source: You survived the Gauntlet, you killed Colter, with Gage's help, of course.
String.Dest: You survived the Gauntlet, you killed Colter, with Gage's help, of course.

String.Source: It means do what you want, but don't get caught. The last thing I need is the Operators and Pack breathing down my neck.
String.Dest: Dělej si co chceš, ale nenech se chytit. Poslední věc, kterou potřebujeme, je, že nám budou Provozáci a Šelmy dýchat za krk.

String.Source: Every one knows we all wanted Colter dead. 'Course if I had my way, it would have been a slow, painful process.
String.Dest: Every one knows we all wanted Colter dead. 'Course if I had my way, it would have been a slow, painful process.

String.Source: It's gonna feel good to be in charge.
String.Dest: It's gonna feel good to be in charge.

String.Source: Watch it, lady. I'm no one's pet.
String.Dest: Watch it, lady. I'm no one's pet.

String.Source: Rules just hold us back. We should be free to do what we want.
String.Dest: Rules just hold us back. We should be free to do what we want.

String.Source: Yeah, yeah. Give it time - you still gotta prove to them you're worth following, remember?
String.Dest: Yeah, yeah. Give it time - you still gotta prove to them you're worth following, remember?

String.Source: Because we need each other. You give us what we want, and it's just a matter of time before everyone in the Commonwealth knows your name.
String.Dest: Because we need each other. You give us what we want, and it's just a matter of time before everyone in the Commonwealth knows your name.

String.Source: Yeah, it sure will. Be real nice to have this place all under our control.
String.Dest: Yeah, it sure will. Be real nice to have this place all under our control.

String.Source: I thought the whole point of having minions was to get them to do the dirty work.
String.Dest: Zdálo se mi, že celá ta věc s nohsledy měla za účel je přimět, aby za tebe dělali špinavou práci.

String.Source: Lot of these idiots can't read, so it needs to be as plain as day for them to get on board. They know what to watch for.
String.Dest: Lot of these idiots can't read, so it needs to be as plain as day for them to get on board. They know what to watch for.

String.Source: We got Colter Nuka-Town, and suddenly he forgot the big picture. We both know how that turned out.
String.Dest: We got Colter Nuka-Town, and suddenly he forgot the big picture. We both know how that turned out.

String.Source: Really? Gage made Colter, and now here you are. I'm just calling it as I see it.
String.Dest: Really? Gage made Colter, and now here you are. I'm just calling it as I see it.

String.Source: But I guess training a puppy is way easier than getting us to do what he wants.
String.Dest: But I guess training a puppy is way easier than getting us to do what he wants.

String.Source: Forget the rest of the parks. We've got enough space here.
String.Dest: Forget the rest of the parks. We've got enough space here.

String.Source: You just make sure the Disciples have more than our fair share of the territories.
String.Dest: You just make sure the Disciples have more than our fair share of the territories.

String.Source: And why would I trust you?
String.Dest: And why would I trust you?

String.Source: Dead serious. Look, you leave it up to anyone else, the gangs'll all just fight over who deserves the space.
String.Dest: Dead serious. Look, you leave it up to anyone else, the gangs'll all just fight over who deserves the space.

String.Source: This world needs rules. Otherwise, we'll never recover.
String.Dest: This world needs rules. Otherwise, we'll never recover.

String.Source: So sure, you're the "Overboss," but that title hasn't meant anything for a long time now.
String.Dest: So sure, you're the "Overboss," but that title hasn't meant anything for a long time now.

String.Source: Side with us, you'll soon find out. Just don't slack off when it comes to actually doing your job.
String.Dest: Side with us, you'll soon find out. Just don't slack off when it comes to actually doing your job.

String.Source: And what are you? His grandma?
String.Dest: And what are you? His grandma?

String.Source: What do you mean by "keeping the peace?"
String.Dest: What do you mean by "keeping the peace?"

String.Source: Apparently, we're not good enough to run this place ourselves. Gage wanted to bring in his own little puppy to replace Colter.
String.Dest: Apparently, we're not good enough to run this place ourselves. Gage wanted to bring in his own little puppy to replace Colter.

String.Source: Plant a flag? Are you serious?
String.Dest: Plant a flag? Are you serious?

String.Source: Last I checked, I'm the Overboss.
String.Dest: Last I checked, I'm the Overboss.

String.Source: If Gage thinks that'll change overnight, he's dead wrong.
String.Dest: If Gage thinks that'll change overnight, he's dead wrong.

String.Source: Pet Project? What's that supposed to mean?
String.Dest: Pet Project? What's that supposed to mean?

String.Source: I'm Nisha. I lead the Disciples. We've only got one rule around here, and that's keeping the peace of this... alliance.
String.Dest: I'm Nisha. I lead the Disciples. We've only got one rule around here, and that's keeping the peace of this... alliance.

String.Source: Gage didn't say anything?
String.Dest: Gage didn't say anything?

String.Source: Of course, it was total shit at first. No imagination, but we spiced it up a bit.
String.Dest: Of course, it was total shit at first. No imagination, but we spiced it up a bit.

String.Source: Although, I could give him a little credit. He built the Gauntlet after all.
String.Dest: Although, I could give him a little credit. He built the Gauntlet after all.

String.Source: Otherwise, the way we see it, this world stopped caring about rules the moment people started dropping bombs on one another.
String.Dest: Otherwise, the way we see it, this world stopped caring about rules the moment people started dropping bombs on one another.

String.Source: But whatever. Let's get this meet and greet over with.
String.Dest: But whatever. Let's get this meet and greet over with.

String.Source: Fuck this up, and I will kill you. Although, I admit I have even better plans for Gage.
String.Dest: Fuck this up, and I will kill you. Although, I admit I have even better plans for Gage.

String.Source: They don't always make it out alive, of course. The Gauntlet never sleeps.
String.Dest: They don't always make it out alive, of course. The Gauntlet never sleeps.

String.Source: Oh now come on, ain't you been listening? That's exactly the kind of shit we heard all the time from Colter.
String.Dest: Oh now come on, ain't you been listening? That's exactly the kind of shit we heard all the time from Colter.

String.Source: I'm Mags.
String.Dest: I'm Mags.

String.Source: ... though by somewhat more cutthroat methods than I expect its founders intended.
String.Dest: ... though by somewhat more cutthroat methods than I expect its founders intended.

String.Source: I suppose we can only hope you work out better than the last one.
String.Dest: I suppose we can only hope you work out better than the last one.

String.Source: I'm the one that sold this whole idea to the gangs. Shit goes south, it ain't just your head they're gonna want on a stick.
String.Dest: I'm the one that sold this whole idea to the gangs. Shit goes south, it ain't just your head they're gonna want on a stick.

String.Source: For the love of... Ain't you been listening?
String.Dest: For the love of... Ain't you been listening?

String.Source: Oh, now this I gotta see....
String.Dest: Oh, now this I gotta see....

String.Source: Why, what's in it for you?
String.Dest: Why, what's in it for you?

String.Source: And hey - we're in this together, so I might as well go all-in. You want me watching your back, you just say the word.
String.Dest: And hey - we're in this together, so I might as well go all-in. You want me watching your back, you just say the word.

String.Source: Suit yourself. Change your mind, I'll be around.
String.Dest: Suit yourself. Change your mind, I'll be around.

String.Source: Tag along, if you want. Might learn a thing or two.
String.Dest: Tag along, if you want. Might learn a thing or two.

String.Source: I like my head where it is, so if I can do anything to help keep it there, I'm gonna. So, what's it gonna be? We doing this together or not?
String.Dest: I like my head where it is, so if I can do anything to help keep it there, I'm gonna. So, what's it gonna be? We doing this together or not?

String.Source: That sounds like a great idea, Gage. You've got a deal.
String.Dest: That sounds like a great idea, Gage. You've got a deal.

String.Source: No thanks. I've got this.
String.Dest: No thanks. I've got this.

String.Source: You're the Overboss....
String.Dest: Jsi Overboss...

String.Source: Then, when you realize just how much...
String.Dest: Then, when you realize just how much...

String.Source: But, if you change your tune and decide to play nice...
String.Dest: But, if you change your tune and decide to play nice...

String.Source: Come on - they're Raiders. They ain't hard to figure out. Tell 'em you like how violent they are, or that you'll shower them in caps.
String.Dest: Come on - they're Raiders. They ain't hard to figure out. Tell 'em you like how violent they are, or that you'll shower them in caps.

String.Source: There's no shortage of work around here, so if you're looking to prove you've got what it takes... you know where to find me.
String.Dest: There's no shortage of work around here, so if you're looking to prove you've got what it takes... you know where to find me.

String.Source: Just don't over-sell yourself.
String.Dest: Just don't over-sell yourself.

String.Source: Now, if you're really looking to get on my good side...
String.Dest: Now, if you're really looking to get on my good side...

String.Source: The Pack... Hell, I don't know. They follow whoever they think is the strongest. Show some teeth, I guess.
String.Dest: The Pack... Hell, I don't know. They follow whoever they think is the strongest. Show some teeth, I guess.

String.Source: Loyalty's a two way street.
String.Dest: Loyalty's a two way street.

String.Source: There's always work to do around here keeping the Zoo in order.
String.Dest: There's always work to do around here keeping the Zoo in order.

String.Source: One last thing before I let you go.
String.Dest: One last thing before I let you go.

String.Source: If you're ever able to lend a hand. Drop by.
String.Dest: If you're ever able to lend a hand. Drop by.

String.Source: We can take either of 'em one on one, but I don't like my odds when it comes to double duty.
String.Dest: We can take either of 'em one on one, but I don't like my odds when it comes to double duty.

String.Source: So you better not screw this up because I'm not about to tolerate another round of bullshit.
String.Dest: So you better not screw this up because I'm not about to tolerate another round of bullshit.

String.Source: Gage will never be one of us. He's a failure. He's lucky we're giving him a second chance.
String.Dest: Gage will never be one of us. He's a failure. He's lucky we're giving him a second chance.

String.Source: So, keep the peace. It's the only rule we need.
String.Dest: So, keep the peace. It's the only rule we need.

String.Source: Colter thought some sort of rule or code made him untouchable... but he found out he was wrong... the hard way.
String.Dest: Colter thought some sort of rule or code made him untouchable... but he found out he was wrong... the hard way.

String.Source: Rules are dangerous because people start to trust them. They make you think you're safe, but once you turn your back... you're dead.
String.Dest: Rules are dangerous because people start to trust them. They make you think you're safe, but once you turn your back... you're dead.

String.Source: So our new Overboss is a vault dweller.
String.Dest: Takže náš nový Overboss je obyvatel vaultu.

String.Source: Sorry, Mags. All anyone's turned up so far is that he's got that Pip-Boy on his arm.
String.Dest: Sorry, Mags. All anyone's turned up so far is that he's got that Pip-Boy on his arm.

String.Source: Sorry, Mags. All anyone's turned up so far is that she's got that Pip-Boy on her arm.
String.Dest: Sorry, Mags. All anyone's turned up so far is that she's got that Pip-Boy on her arm.

String.Source: Hmm. You can go.
String.Dest: Hmm. You can go.

String.Source: Or iced a vault dweller.
String.Dest: Or iced a vault dweller.

String.Source: Huge, built like a goddamn fortress. You run this, the world is yours.
String.Dest: Huge, built like a goddamn fortress. You run this, the world is yours.

String.Source: Look, I'll be honest with you: this operation needs someone to step in and take the reins.
String.Dest: Look, I'll be honest with you: this operation needs someone to step in and take the reins.

String.Source: So, seems like you're the "jump in head-first" kind of Overboss, huh? Hear you've already chatted up all the gang leaders...
String.Dest: So, seems like you're the "jump in head-first" kind of Overboss, huh? Hear you've already chatted up all the gang leaders...

String.Source: But I'm telling you, it ain't gonna be that bad.
String.Dest: But I'm telling you, it ain't gonna be that bad.

String.Source: Sure as hell ain't gonna be me; leading outright ain't my style, and there's already some blamin' me for supporting Colter all this time.
String.Dest: Sure as hell ain't gonna be me; leading outright ain't my style, and there's already some blamin' me for supporting Colter all this time.

String.Source: You just need to show 'em you're the right woman for the job.
String.Dest: You just need to show 'em you're the right woman for the job.

String.Source: But do take a little time to consider the kind of life we could all have if we put this place back to doing what it does best.
String.Dest: But do take a little time to consider the kind of life we could all have if we put this place back to doing what it does best.

String.Source: I hear you, Gage.
String.Dest: I hear you, Gage.

String.Source: Aside from being a good shot and having a foul mouth?
String.Dest: Aside from being a good shot and having a foul mouth?

String.Source: Ha. I ain't gonna lie, it's a part of the reason you won't see me stepping up and running things.
String.Dest: Ha. I ain't gonna lie, it's a part of the reason you won't see me stepping up and running things.

String.Source: My talents are best put to use helping a new Overboss get all this shit under control. You get me?
String.Dest: My talents are best put to use helping a new Overboss get all this shit under control. You get me?

String.Source: I've run with gangs nearly my whole life. I know how Raiders think, what they're after, and how to use that to your advantage.
String.Dest: I've run with gangs nearly my whole life. I know how Raiders think, what they're after, and how to use that to your advantage.

String.Source: Okay, this should be simple. The gangs are all lookin' for someone to lead them, whether they'd admit it or not.
String.Dest: Okay, this should be simple. The gangs are all lookin' for someone to lead them, whether they'd admit it or not.

String.Source: Oh sure, I understand. So are you just going to paint the bullseye directly on my back, or what?
String.Dest: Oh sure, I understand. So are you just going to paint the bullseye directly on my back, or what?

String.Source: I'll be here if you need me.
String.Dest: Když mě budeš potřebovat, tak budu tady.

String.Source: Good. I know I'm throwing a lot at you all at once here.
String.Dest: Good. I know I'm throwing a lot at you all at once here.

String.Source: And we'll all be anxiously awaiting getting this place back to doing what it does best.
String.Dest: And we'll all be anxiously awaiting getting this place back to doing what it does best.

String.Source: If somethin' ain't done soon to settle things down, it's gonna reach a point there ain't no coming back from.
String.Dest: If somethin' ain't done soon to settle things down, it's gonna reach a point there ain't no coming back from.

String.Source: I'll be here if you need me. You are the Overboss, after all. Just... don't screw this up.
String.Dest: I'll be here if you need me. You are the Overboss, after all. Just... don't screw this up.

String.Source: Trust me, I'm in this just as much as you are. This shit needs to work out.
String.Dest: Trust me, I'm in this just as much as you are. This shit needs to work out.

String.Source: No. A coward would've run for the hills when things started lookin' bad. That ain't me.
String.Dest: No. A coward would've run for the hills when things started lookin' bad. That ain't me.

String.Source: What sort of talents would you say you have, Gage?
String.Dest: What sort of talents would you say you have, Gage?

String.Source: Oh, so you're a coward. I get it.
String.Dest: Oh, so you're a coward. I get it.

String.Source: I mean to fix what's gone wrong here, and I'm saying I need your help. Slinging insults back and forth ain't gonna get us nowhere.
String.Dest: I mean to fix what's gone wrong here, and I'm saying I need your help. Slinging insults back and forth ain't gonna get us nowhere.

String.Source: Gangs started staking out as much territory as they could, all being on top of each other like this. Started looking for excuses to turn on each other.
String.Dest: Gangs started staking out as much territory as they could, all being on top of each other like this. Started looking for excuses to turn on each other.

String.Source: Ain't gonna lie, I've heard about you. Part of that Railroad, ain't ya?
String.Dest: Ain't gonna lie, I've heard about you. Part of that Railroad, ain't ya?

String.Source: I don't give a damn about their little crusade, but guess I know you've got some fight in ya.
String.Dest: I don't give a damn about their little crusade, but guess I know you've got some fight in ya.

String.Source: I ain't no genius, but far as I'm concerned, history already proved what they're after ain't gonna work.
String.Dest: I ain't no genius, but far as I'm concerned, history already proved what they're after ain't gonna work.

String.Source: You know, I've heard about you. In charge of the Minutemen, ain't ya? No idea why you'd waste your time with those has-beens.
String.Dest: You know, I've heard about you. In charge of the Minutemen, ain't ya? No idea why you'd waste your time with those has-beens.

String.Source: You know, I've heard of you, and that Institute of yours... Some pretty shady stuff you all are up to.
String.Dest: You know, I've heard of you, and that Institute of yours... Some pretty shady stuff you all are up to.

String.Source: They ain't that different from a Raider gang, you ask me. Just try and act all legitimate, but they still just take what they want.
String.Dest: They ain't that different from a Raider gang, you ask me. Just try and act all legitimate, but they still just take what they want.

String.Source: You know, I think I heard of you... some bigshot with the Brotherhood of Steel, right?
String.Dest: You know, I think I heard of you... some bigshot with the Brotherhood of Steel, right?

String.Source: Guess I already know you're willing to do whatever it takes to get what you want, though.
String.Dest: Guess I already know you're willing to do whatever it takes to get what you want, though.
